review: Love Fire TV. Easy Setup. Have taken Fire TV with me on vacation as it is that easy to setup. If U already have Prime Membership, it is programmed to your account by Amazon when it arrives. Buy this n U can decrease your cable TV expense.
author: tigerzz

review: Love my Amazon fire. Recommend it to everyone.  Would be miserable without it!
author: Lin411

review: I love this product. I am not very tech savvy but this is extremely easy to use and there are tons of cool shows and movies. Never going back to cable or dish. Now if someone could tell us the difference between the box and the stick. ....
author: Tammy

review: My wife and my son love it, I have being working a lot lately but I like what I have seen so far. I think it's nice.
author: Richie

review: It's wonderful and sure beats direct tv's prices!!
author: Deena Coldren

review: Works great. We have been prime members for a while but this really makes the prime instant video experience much better.
author: Amazon Customer

review: Just started using it this week, so far so good.
author: Amazon Customer
